desc: Hand dyed wool yarn. Shop online or visit our Auckland dye studio shop. Our soft, natural yarns suit any knitting, crochet, or weaving project, and our kits make it easy. We carry 2ply, 4ply, DK, up to Super Bulky in Merino, Mohair, Yak, Silk, Linen and Cotton. Projects you love start with yarn you love.
